rooms.description: A spacious living room with ample seating and entertainment area. Vastu compliant by ensuring the entrance faces north, with a clear view of the garden.
A modern dining area that flows from the living room. Designed to host family meals and social gatherings.
An ergonomic kitchen with open design integrated with living spaces, featuring wheelchair accessibility and Vastu-approved layout for wealth and prosperity.
A well-appointed master bedroom with south-west orientation to promote restful sleep as per Vastu principles. Includes a built-in closet for enhanced functionality.
A secondary bedroom designed for additional members, ensuring ample space and comfortable furniture arrangement.
Another bedroom providing personal space with a view of the garden. Vastu alignment ensures balanced energy flow.
The final bedroom in this floor plan, ensuring privacy and comfort for all family members.
A dedicated, quiet space designed as a home office. It is strategically placed away from noisy areas but remains accessible to wheelchair users with proper ramp access and wide doorways.
Accessible bathroom designed for comfort and ease, incorporating grab bars and adjustable fixtures for wheelchair accessibility. Vastu principles are applied to maintain a harmonious energy flow.
A small balcony that provides an outdoor space and natural light, designed with Vastu compliance by facing east for prosperity.

openings.description: A north-facing entrance that provides direct access to the living area and integrates with the overall design, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles.
A secure exit door in the living area for emergencies, accessible via wheelchair ramps if required.
